thought: I need to craft a stick, which requires placing bamboo in the crafting table. The closest bamboo is at slot 30, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I now have bamboo in the crafting table, so I can craft 4 sticks by moving them to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
